main.title: Every tool you need to work with PDFs in one place
main.subtitle: One location for all the tools you need to work with PDFs. You have access to all the tools that are required to use PDFs. Each is totally free and simple to use. You may combine, divide, compress, convert, rotate, unlock, and watermark PDF files with only a few clicks.

details.title: Merge PDF
details.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

details.title: Split PDF
details.description: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

details.title: Compress PDF
details.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

details.title: PDF to Word
details.description: Easily convert your PDF files into easy to edit DOC and DOCX documents. The converted WORD document is almost 100% accurate.

details.title: PDF to Powerpoint
details.description: Turn your PDF files into easy to edit PPT and PPTX slideshows.

details.title: PDF to Excel
details.description: Pull data straight from PDFs into Excel spreadsheets in a few short seconds.

details.title: Word to PDF
details.description: Make DOC and DOCX files easy to read by converting them to PDF.

details.title: Powerpoint to PDF
details.description: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.

details.title: Excel to PDF
details.description: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

details.title: Edit PDF
details.description: Add text, images, shapes or freehand annotations to a PDF document. Edit the size, font, and color of the added content.

details.title: PDF to JPG
details.description: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

details.title: JPG to PDF
details.description: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

details.title: Sign PDF
details.description: Sign yourself or request electronic signatures from others.

details.title: Watermark
details.description: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

details.title: Rotate PDF
details.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

details.title: Unlock PDF
details.description: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

details.title: Protect PDF
details.description: Protect PDF files with a password. Encrypt PDF documents to prevent unauthorized access.

details.title: Organize PDF
details.description: Sort pages of your PDF file however you like. Delete PDF pages or add PDF pages to your document at your convenience.

details.title: PDF to PDF/A
details.description: Transform your PDF to PDF/A, the ISO-standardized version of PDF for long-term archiving. Your PDF will preserve formatting when accessed in the future.

details.title: Repair PDF
details.description: Repair a damaged PDF and recover data from corrupt PDF. Fix PDF files with our Repair tool.

details.title: Page numbers
details.description: Add page numbers into PDFs with ease. Choose your positions, dimensions, typography.

details.title: Scan to PDF
details.description: Capture document scans from your mobile device and send them instantly to your browser.

details.title: OCR PDF
details.description: Easily convert scanned PDF into searchable and selectable documents.

premium.heading: Premium Offers More
premium.subHeading: With batch processing of data, you may finish tasks more quickly.
premium.subHeading1: You can also use OCR to convert scanned documents and e-sign contracts for your organization.

merge.title: Merge PDF files
merge.subTitle: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

split.title: Split PDF file
split.subTitle: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

compress.title: Compress PDF file
compress.subTitle: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

jpg_to_pdf.title: JPG to PDF
jpg_to_pdf.subTitle: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

word_to_pdf.title: Convert WORD to PDF
word_to_pdf.subTitle: Make DOC and DOCX files easy to read by converting them to PDF.

powerpoint_to_pdf.title: Convert POWERPOINT to PDF
powerpoint_to_pdf.subTitle: Make PPT and PPTX slideshows easy to view by converting them to PDF.

excel_to_pdf.title: Convert EXCEL to PDF
excel_to_pdf.subTitle: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

pdf_to_jpg.title: PDF to JPG
pdf_to_jpg.subTitle: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

pdf_to_word.title: PDF to WORD Converter
pdf_to_word.subTitle: Convert your PDF to WORD documents with incredible accuracy.Powered by Solid Documents.

pdf_to_powerpoint.title: Convert PDF to POWERPOINT
pdf_to_powerpoint.subTitle: Convert your PDFs to POWERPOINT. Powered by Solid Documents.

pdf_to_excel.title: Convert PDF to EXCEL
pdf_to_excel.subTitle: Convert PDF Data to EXCEL Spreadsheets. Powered by Solid Documents.

pdf_to_pdfa.title: PDF to PDF/A
pdf_to_pdfa.subTitle: Convert PDF documents to PDF/A for archiving and long-term preservation. Convert to a specific PDF/A ISO conformance level.

remove_pages.title: Remove PDF pages
remove_pages.subTitle: Select and remove the PDF pages you don’t need. Get a new file without your deleted pages.

organize.title: Organize PDF
organize.subTitle: Sort, add and delete PDF pages. Drag and drop the page thumbnails and sort them in our PDF organizer.

repair.title: Repair PDF file
repair.subTitle: Upload a corrupt PDF and we will try to fix it. Depending on how much the PDF is damaged we will be able to recover it partially or completely.

ocr.title: OCR PDF
ocr.subTitle: Convert non-selectable PDF files into selectable and searchable PDF with high accuracy.

rotate.title: Rotate PDF
rotate.subTitle: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

add_page_numbers.title: Add PDF page numbers
add_page_numbers.subTitle: Add page numbers into PDFs with ease. Choose your positions, dimensions, typography.

watermark.title: Add watermark into a PDF
watermark.subTitle: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

edit.title: PDF Editor
edit.subTitle: Edit PDF by adding text, shapes, comments and highlights. Your secure and simple tool to edit PDF.

unlock.title: Unlock PDF
unlock.subTitle: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

protect.title: Protect PDF file
protect.subTitle: Encrypt your PDF with a password to keep sensitive data confidential.

sign.title: Sign PDF
sign.subTitle: Your tool to eSign documents. Sign a document yourself or send a signature request to others.
